name: The House After Investigation (Demo)
description:
NOTE: This is after you escape from the house!

You finally got out! Now go back to the police station and tell them everything.

You thought you killed 5-0-6. No. It's alive! And of course you didn't escape.

Find a way out.

This is only a short demo. Don't be suprised if you find any bugs. In fact if you find bugs, please tell me in the comments :)
